00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 namespace cxx {
00023 
00024 template< typename T > class D_list;
00025 
00026 template< typename T >
00027 class D_list_item_base
00028 {
00029 private:
00030   friend class D_list<T>;
00031   D_list_item_base *_n, *_p;
00032 
00033 public:
00034   explicit D_list_item_base(D_list_item_base *n = 0, D_list_item_base *p = 0)
00035   : _n(n), _p(p) {}
00036 
00037   T *l_next() const { return static_cast<T*>(_n); }
00038   T *l_prev() const { return static_cast<T*>(_p); }
00039 
00040   void l_remove()
00041   {
00042     if (_p) _p->_n = _n;
00043     if (_n) _n->_p = _p;
00044     _n = 0;
00045     _p = 0;
00046   };
00047 
00048   void l_add_before(D_list_item_base *other)
00049   {
00050     _p = other->_p;
00051     _n = other;
00052     other->_p->_n = this;
00053     other->_p = this;
00054   }
00055 
00056   void l_add_after(D_list_item_base *other)
00057   {
00058     _p = other;
00059     _n = other->_n;
00060     if (other->_n) other->_n->_p = this;
00061     other->_n = this;
00062   }
00063 
00064   ~D_list_item_base() { l_remove(); }
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 template< typename T >
00069 class D_list_item : private D_list_item_base<T>
00070 {
00071 private:
00072   friend class D_list<T>;
00073   friend class D_list_item_base<T>;
00074   typedef D_list_item_base<T> B;
00075 
00076 public:
00077   using B::l_prev;
00078   using B::l_next;
00079   using B::l_remove;
00080   void l_add_before(T *other) { B::l_add_before(other); }
00081   void l_add_after(T *other) { B::l_add_after(other); }
00082 };
00083 
00084 template< typename T >
00085 class D_list : private D_list_item_base<T>
00086 {
00087 private:
00088   friend class D_list_item_base<T>;
00089   typedef D_list_item_base<T> B;
00090 
00091 public:
00092   typedef T Item;
00093 
00094   D_list() : B(this, this)
00095   {}
00096 
00097   explicit D_list(T *first) : B(first, first)
00098   {
00099     if (first)
00100       {
00101   B::_n->_n = this;
00102   B::_n->_p = this;
00103       }
00104   }
00105 
00106   T *first() const { return B::_n != this  ? B::l_next() : 0; }
00107   T *last() const { return B::_p != this  ? B::l_prev() : 0; }
00108 
00109   void add(T *e) { e->D_list_item_base<T>::l_add_after(this); }
00110   void add_tail(T *e) { e->D_list_item_base<T>::l_add_before(this); }
00111 
00112   T* next(T const *current) const
00113   { return current->_n != this ? current->l_next() : 0; }
00114 
00115   T* prev(T const *current) const
00116   { return current->_p != this ? current->l_prev() : 0; }
00117 };
00118 
00119 
00120 }
